enWisdom: The good doer is one whose words are affirmed by his actions

Wisdom: الشَّرَفُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ بِحُسْنِ الْأَعْمَالِ لَا بِحُسْنِ الْأَقْوَالِ
enWisdom: Honour in the sight of Allah, the Glorified, is through righteous actions, not by beautiful words

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِلَى إِعْرَابِ الْأَعْمَالِ أَحْوَجُ مِنْكُمْ إِلَى إِعْرَابِ الْأَقْوَالِ
enWisdom: Surely you are in greater need of performing your actions than you are of articulating your words

Wisdom: زِيَادَةُ الْفِعْلِ عَلَى الْقَوْلِ أَحْسَنُ فَضِيلَةٍ وَنَقْصُ الْفِعْلِ عَنِ الْقَوْلِ أَقْبَحُ رَذِيلَةٍ
enWisdom: Supplementing words with action is the best virtue and the abstraction of action from words is the ugliest vice

Wisdom: لَنْ يُجْدِيَ الْقَوْلُ حَتَّى يَتَّصِلَ بِالْفِعْلِ
enWisdom: Speech will never be beneficial unless it is joined with action

Wisdom: لِسَانُ الْحَالِ أَصْدَقُ مِنْ لِسَانِ الْمَقَالِ
enWisdom: The tongue of action is truer than the tongue of speech
There is no benefit in speech without action

Wisdom: يَقْبُحُ بِالرَّجُلِ أَنْ يَقْصُرَ عَمَلُهُ عَنْ عِلْمِهِ وَيَعْجِزَ فِعْلُهُ عَنْ قَوْلِهِ
enWisdom: It is shameful for a person’s deeds to fall short of his knowledge and for his actions to be incapable of matching his words
